title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 6019.1 - Definitions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 6019.1 - Definitions

State Regulations

When used in this Part: (a) The term
commissioner
shall mean the Commissioner of the Division of Criminal Justice Services or his
or her designee. (b) The term
council
shall mean the Municipal Police Training

Council. (c) The term
pre-employment correction basic training course
shall mean the
course of training prescribed in section
6019.3
of this Part that the
commissioner has approved, in writing, as meeting or exceeding the prescribed
minimum standards. (d) The term
pre-employment correction training school
shall mean an entity
which provides a pre-employment correction basic training course within the

State of New York which meets or exceeds the minimum qualifications as set
forth in section
6019.3
of this Part, or other
approved pre-employment correction training, and has been approved as a
pre-employment correction training school by the commissioner in accordance
with section
6019.4
of this Part. (e) The term course director shall mean the
director or co-director of an organization that administers an approved
pre-employment correction training school, or his or her designee who is
responsible for the administration of the school's courses and is certified by
the Commissioner as an individual whose qualifications meet or exceed the
requirements set forth in section
6023.3
-a of this Part. (f) The term
municipality
shall mean any county, city, town, park commission, village, or police district
in the State, or training academy sponsored by one or more police
departments"
TM
and/or
sheriffs"
TM
offices. (g) The term
college
shall
have the same meaning as set forth in Part 50 of Title 8 NYCRR. (h) The term
university
shall have the same meaning as set forth in Part 50 of Title 8 NYCRR. (i) The term
junior college
or
two-year college
shall have the same meaning as set forth
in Part 50 of Title 8 NYCRR. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
6019.1

Adopted

New

York State Register March 22, 2017/Volume XXXIX, Issue 12, eff. 3/22/2017

Amended

New

York State Register March 25, 2020/Volume XLII, Issue 12, eff. 3/25/2020

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
